Class playn.core.Pointer

Changed from an interface to a class. Changed from abstract to non-abstract.

Added Constructors
Pointer(Platform)  
 

Removed Methods
void cancelLayerDrags() Cancels any currently active drag interaction on a layer.
boolean isEnabled() Returns true if pointer interaction is enabled, false if not.
Listener listener() Returns the currently configured global pointer listener, or null.
void setEnabled(boolean) Allows pointer interaction to be temporarily disabled.
void setListener(Listener) Sets the listener that will receive pointer events.
 

Added Fields
boolean enabled Allows pointer interaction to be temporarily disabled.
